DOC.detailed_description: Episiotomy surgical incision perineum order enlarge vaginal orifice second stage labor . Although seven type episiotomy described literature , frequently perform type mediolateral median episiotomy , former common one . Despite common obstetric practice , exact definition `` mediolateral '' episiotomy often unclear . Several study report , however , state significant proportion so-claimed mediolateral episiotomy actually mediolateral . The current trial compare two angle mediolateral episiotomy , regard risk third- fourth-degree perineal tearing , episiotomy-related pain dyspareunia primiparous woman large tertiary maternity center , namely Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital , Cairo , Egypt .
